bug.author: tvst
bug.summary: z-index of st.balloons is too low
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Steps to repro</denchmark-h>
Click on "say meow" here: https://jlt-cat-a-log.herokuapp.com/
Expected: You should see balloons appear and float their way up the screen, always unobstructed by other on-screen elements. Actual: You see the balloons flowing up, but they sometimes appear behind certain UI elements, like Plotly charts. <denchmark-h:h3>Solution</denchmark-h>
We should bump Baloons' z-index to something ridiculous, like "one gazillion".

comments.comment: I'd like to work on this if I can!
